mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.role_name roleName, a.role_code roleCode FROM sys_role a INNER JOIN sys_user_role b ON a.id = b.role_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType = BIGINT} AND a.active = 1

SELECT a.permissions FROM sys_menu a INNER JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.id = b.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role c ON b.role_id = c.role_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType = BIGINT} AND a.permissions IS NOT NULL AND a.permissions != '' AND c.user_id = 1 AND a.active = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user a SET a.active = 0, a.modify_by = #{modifyBy, jdbcType = BIGINT}, a.gmt_modify = sysdate(), a.version_no = a.version_no + 1 WHERE a.id = #{id, jdbcType = BIGINT} AND a.active = 1 AND a.version_no = #{versionNo, jdbcType = BIGINT}
